OpenHouseDate.title: Open House Date
OpenHouseDate.description: Represents a scheduled open house date.

month.description: The month of the open house (e.g., 'November 2025').

days.description: The specific days of the open house (e.g., 'Vrijdag 1 & Zaterdag 2').

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the date was added.

PageView.title: Page View
PageView.description: Represents a single page view event.

path.description: The path of the page that was viewed (e.g., '/').

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the page view.

userAgent.description: The user agent of the visitor.

GalleryImage.title: Gallery Image
GalleryImage.description: An image displayed in the website gallery.

ValueProposition.title: Value Proposition
ValueProposition.description: A feature or value proposition item.

HeroContent.title: Hero Content
HeroContent.description: Content for the main hero section.

/open_house_dates/{dateId}.description: Stores the dates for open house events.

/page_views/{viewId}.description: Stores page view events for simple analytics.

/content_blocks/hero.description: Stores content for the hero section.
